channel.title: DATclient 10 - Fullscreen [BETA]
channel.description:
--Since the BETA release, the following has been added -- - Added tabs around the inventory - Fixed the inventory 'see-through' clicking problem - Removed music player (play your own music) - Added zoom in-and-out via the mouse's scrollwheel (if you dont have one, tough luck.)
Here are some pics: [IMG]http://i617.photobucket.com/albums/tt254/drdanielfc/001.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i617.photobucket.com/albums/tt254/drdanielfc/002.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i617.photobucket.com/albums/tt254/drdanielfc/003.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i617.photobucket.com/albums/tt254/drdanielfc/004.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i617.photobucket.com/albums/tt254/drdanielfc/005.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i617.photobucket.com/albums/tt254/drdanielfc/006.jpg[/img]
- The client will download the cache after the client loads. When it is done downloading (5 mins max) the go to File>Quit and restart the client. It may begin downloading again, just quit anyway. This is only the BETA, so please post any bugs you find in it. - After the client finalizes its install, it will load in normal mode. Go to view>fullscreen to bring it into fullscreen mode.
Credits: DrDanielF(rank)C - Putting it all together! Ant of Hell - Sprites and Ideas Master Monk - Secretary? Galkon - Pissing me off with his progress and making me work faster Webber - Client Base Ric914 - Client Base Danno - Transparency Blood Isle - Sky Jakey455 - Gameframe
**These links are missing several features advertised above. They will be added in the final release** Download (mediafire): [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ijknnlzmkzu]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ijknnlzmkzu[/url]
If the cache download fails (no downloader pops up) download the cache from [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?d2kc3c15fzu]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?d2kc3c15fzu[/url] and extract it to C:\WINDOWS\.dat_cache_store

item.title: DATclient 10 - Fullscreen [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @drdanielfrankc drdanielfrankc
item.description:
@drdanielfrankc wrote:

[quote=“Raams, post:25, topic:262263”][code]DATclient 10 BETA 1
Released by DrDanielFC

www.freewebs.com/datscape

Press enter to continue…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Do I need to update my Java? Because I ran this on my other computer and it worked fine… Also this computer was custom made so I don’t know if that has anything to do with this but some programs don’t work proporly on here… =/[/quote]

did you extract it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2009, 05:50:54 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Kyleownage, post:1, topic:267312”][quote author=drdanielfrankc link=topic=346360.msg2705654#msg2705654 date=1236969163]

Epic. Although were did that background come from?

Its an old one my friend and I made. It was just for testing but ive been to lazy to make a new one.
[/quote] Oh well it’s Still good, Could i use this for testing out my Server and use it as a base Client perhaps?[/quote]

Hm…i really dont want to release the source. but im gonna have it said up so you can set your own default ip through a text file - and sprites custom. that ok? if you want to work out some kind of deal with me, dcentore@optonline.net[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2009, 05:53:01 pm[/size][hr][quote=“koolgordon, post:24, topic:262263”]Yea,
I’m an administrator on my comp daniel.[/quote]

hmm… i’d just wait till the fixed version comes out. shouldnt take more than 1-2 months. I just need to finish my new server computer because I refuse to run servers off of a laptop.

Read full topic

item.title: DATclient 10 - Fullscreen [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @drdanielfrankc drdanielfrankc
item.description:
@drdanielfrankc wrote:

[quote=“koolgordon, post:17, topic:262263”]
My error Daniel…[/quote]

O sorry you misunderstood
When I say like
C:>
im basically saying that yu type wats after the ‘>’
So you should actually type:

cd C:\WINDOWS
mkdir .dat_cache_store

Then extract the cache to C:\WINDOWS.dat_cache_store.
The cache download has been fixed for the final release, and honestly I wouldnt bother dling this one unless you just want to get the feel of it. there arent any tabs or such in the beta.

Read full topic

item.title: DATclient 10 - Fullscreen [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @drdanielfrankc drdanielfrankc
item.description:
@drdanielfrankc wrote:

[quote=“koolgordon, post:15, topic:262263”]Daniel,
Can you just Upload an empty folder names .dat_cache_store? or make a new one like .scapedat_cache_store?[/quote]

The betas outdated so you really shouldnt worry until i finish the server and the final client… but if you want to use it anyway then:

Command prompt:
C:> cd C:\WINDOWS
C:> mkdir .dat_cache_store

and extract the contents of
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?d2kc3c15fzu
to that. If you need any help email me dcentore@optonline.net

Read full topic

item.title: DATclient 10 - Fullscreen [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @drdanielfrankc drdanielfrankc
item.description:
@drdanielfrankc wrote:

weeds:

are you ever going to make this an open source or give us a tutorial on how to do it cos im dieing to do this lol all ive managed so far is to stretcvh the screen but not the game itself lol pretty bad ino but im pretty crap at coding java more into c++ lol

Im never making it open source or tutorial. However, ill help you make one if you want to email me at dcentore@optonline.net. I just dont want noobs making fullscreen clients if they have no idea what they are doing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2009, 04:33:34 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Priceydude, post:13, topic:262263”]Will this work on any 317 server?[/quote]

It should, yes. There might be some problems if you have things rigged, but it shouldnt take long to fix.

And what i mean by rigged is like:
sendQuest(" DATscape", 3026);
might not line up perfect

Read full topic
